text:
*Monte Carlo  is hiring a Content Marketing Manager* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

Monte Carlo is looking for a content marketing manager, reporting directly into the Head of Content. In this role, you’ll be responsible for setting and executing on the company’s content and social media strategy around the emerging category of Data Observability. We are looking for a passionate, driven, and empathetic storyteller who can tap into the needs, challenges, and opportunities of our users through content and social media. (TL;DR: Monte Carlo is a Series B startups funded by Accel, GGV, Redpoint, and other leading investors working with such companies as the NYT, Intuit, Vimeo, and Eventbrite).

*Learn more and apply here:* <https://bit.ly/3aXWzp5>

<@U0207Q0URQC>

attachments.title: Monte Carlo - Content Marketing Manager
attachments.text: Monte Carlo is looking for a content marketing manager, reporting directly into the Head of Content. In this role, you’ll be responsible for setting and executing on the company’s technical content strategy around the emerging category of Data Observability. You will collaborate closely with a small team of engineers, product managers, account executives, and marketers to develop content, run webinars, build social media campaigns, and grow Monte Carlo’s presence as a leading voice in the data engineering and analytics space. We are looking for a passionate, driven, and empathetic storyteller who can tap into the needs, challenges, and opportunities of our users through content and social media. What gets you excited: - Writing and editing technical content, including weekly blog articles, product documentation, and social media collateral. - Partnering cross-functionally with internal and external teams to produce content, host webinars, and present at meetups and industry events.

text:
*Gloat is hiring a Senior UX Writer* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

- Help develop Gloat’s tone and voice as the product grows and evolves
- Create clear and consistent copy for the platform which facilitates user navigation, onboarding, error messages, and other end-to-end user experience components
- Help shape flows, features and products as an equal partner in the product development lifecycle

*Learn more and apply here:* <https://bit.ly/3xjxkH4>

<@U020LPDC3TJ>

attachments.title: Gloat - Join Our Team
attachments.text: We are Gloat. The revolutionary AI that’s helping to guide the careers of a connected generation. We use real time data to uncover new paths and the career opportunities that can help you pursue them. Gloat helps you find the satisfaction you deserve.

text:
*Contently is hiring a Content Strategist* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

Content Strategists are Contently's customer-facing content experts who provide strategic guidance to brands launching or scaling their programs, drive adoption of our award-winning SaaS platform, and manage and grow their own books of business (hello, bonus plan!). As a Content Strategist you'll manage the day-to-day running of accounts and develop/deliver in-depth, data-driven analyses, performance reports, and workshops. You'll also own the commercial relationship with your clients and identify and pursue expansion opportunities within their organizations. This position can be based in NYC or remote.

*Learn more and apply here:* <https://bit.ly/2S4g3Se>

<@UJESWE5MJ>

attachments.title: Looking For A Content Marketing Job? Come Work With The Best
attachments.text: Ready to do the best work of your career? Join a company that has programs meant to help you feel valued. Check out Contently's job postings and apply!
attachments.fallback: Contently: Looking For A Content Marketing Job? Come Work With The Best

text:
*Workvivo is hiring a Content Marketing manager* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

We are looking for a talented “Chief Content Creator” to create phenomenal thought leadership content that helps define our space and drive brand awareness and demand.

We are disrupting the employee communication & engagement space - one of the world’s largest and most competitive markets right now and thought leadership is a key pillar in our strategy.

We are looking for a creative marketer, with a writing background, a product marketer’s depth, experience in B2B, who knows how to turn insights into engaging thought leadership content in a variety of formats.

*Learn more and apply here:* <https://bit.ly/3nr5bcO>

*Macrometa is hiring a Content Lead* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

Macrometa is looking to hire a content lead to help shape our content strategy and build the brand from the ground up. If you're interested in venture-backed early-stage startups and would like to help define the future of cloud computing, please reach out! We have a global remote-friendly team.

*To apply, send an email to:* `<mailto:justin@macrometa.com|justin@macrometa.com>`
